text: "The Greatest Mistakes" is a song by Australian alternative rock band Birds of Tokyo and is the third single from their sixth studio album, Human Design. It was released on 16 August 2019. Band member Ian Kenny said "The Greatest Mistakes" is cut from the same cloth as "Good Lord" saying "It's actually inspired by the same personal experience... but it's got the perspective of thankfully being a bit further down the road." ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! Chart (2019) ! Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Digital Tracks (ARIA) | 21 |} ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:2019 singles Category:Birds of Tokyo songs Category:EMI Records singles
title: The Greatest Mistakes
